# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "JuceDemoPlugin.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("JuceDemoPlugin")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE
  "${JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.2.1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "0nRd9LLGO"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "JuceDemoPlugin"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "ROLI Ltd."
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT "ROLI Ltd."
  COMPANY_WEBSITE "www.juce.com"
  COMPANY_EMAIL "info@juce.com"
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "Audio Plug-in"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.juce.JuceDemoPlugin"
  INCLUDE_BINARYDATA ON
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++14"
)

jucer_audio_plugin_settings(
  BUILD_VST ON
  BUILD_VST3 OFF
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT ON
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT_V3 ON
  BUILD_RTAS OFF
  BUILD_AAX OFF
  BUILD_STANDALONE_PLUGIN ON
  ENABLE_INTER_APP_AUDIO OFF
  PLUGIN_NAME "Juce Demo Plugin"
  PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION "Juce Demo Plugin"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER "ROLI Ltd."
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE "ROLI"
  PLUGIN_CODE "Jcdm"
  # PLUGIN_CHANNEL_CONFIGURATIONS
  PLUGIN_IS_A_SYNTH OFF
  PLUGIN_MIDI_INPUT ON
  PLUGIN_MIDI_OUTPUT ON
  MIDI_EFFECT_PLUGIN OFF
  KEY_FOCUS ON
  PLUGIN_AU_EXPORT_PREFIX "JuceDemoProjectAU"
  # PLUGIN_AU_MAIN_TYPE
  # VST_CATEGORY
  # PLUGIN_RTAS_CATEGORY
  PLUGIN_AAX_CATEGORY "AAX_ePlugInCategory_Dynamics"
  PLUGIN_AAX_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.JuceDemoPlugin"
)
